Quebeq, Canada. Full-time.

Gush - http://getgush.com We are hiring a bunch of people. We use Scala and Play, and are building a large-scale consumer photo service. We launched last week in private beta.

Looking specifically for you if you can do ops like crazy (AWS in your dreams), if you're great at Scala, if you're awesome at CSS + design, or any combination. Also looking for a native Windows developer, and iOS/mobile experience is also always welcome.

Get it touch at jobs@gushhq.com. Show us what you've done.
